amendment.description: To require reports on the United States strategy for relief and reconstruction efforts in Iraq, and to limit the availability of certain funds for those efforts pending determinations by the President that the objectives and deadlines for those efforts will be substantially achieved.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1848 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1848 proposed by Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S12596-12598; text: CR S12596) To require reports on the United States strategy for relief and reconstruction efforts in Iraq, and to limit the availability of certain funds for those efforts pending determinations by the President that the objectives and deadlines for those efforts will be substantially achieved.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1848 proposed by Senator Feinstein.
